conbody.p: Your system is installed by . The team will:

ul.li: Set up your base system of cluster nodes
Perform initial configuration of the system components and initialize them

conbody.p: The system consists includes a number of components:

ul.li: The Hadoop ecosystem, including YARN and Accumulo
Ambari, a web-based console for provisioning, managing, and monitoring the cluster
MongoDB, a high availability, scalable document database
Tornado, the Python-based framework on which the web application runs
Nginx, used as a web proxy server by

conbody.p: A number of components are implemented as Docker containers. will install Docker as part of system installation.
The platforms can support multiple data contexts, called "tenants." will have installed some number of tenants for your deployment. These tenants need to be included in system administration.
